SA09bsa015_u:3: śubhamālakṣya kṛtā vai kāścidāryāgītayastvayā ca śravyāḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:4: Sl_2 dārumayī hyapi pratimā sampūjyate kāpi sugatasya vidvadbhiḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:5: tathāmanojñaṃ kāvyaṃ saddharmāśrayācca mamedaṃ na nindyam //
SA09bsa015_u:6: Sl_3 mahāmuneratimadhuraṃ manye vacanaṃ bhavatāvagatameva syāt /
SA09bsa015_u:7: ākalpitaṃ tu sudhayā nanvatidhavalaṃ na dṛśyate candrikayā? //
SA09bsa015_u:13: dānaṃ deyaṃ vidhinā janmāntareṣu na dānāt paraṃ mitram //
SA09bsa015_u:15: carācarapratiṣṭhaṃ tu guṇāśrayaṃ bhūvacca rājate śīlam //
SA09bsa015_u:16: Sl_8 ṣaḍimā dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāḥ pāramitāḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:18: Sl_9 yatra pūjā pitṝṇāṃ kulaṃ tadācāryabrahmabhiḥ samṛddham /
SA09bsa015_u:23: labhate hi pumān strī vā suramyakāmāvacarādidevakāyam //
SA09bsa015_u:30: Sl_15 kṣāntisamaṃ naiva tapastatastvayā na krodhāvasaro deyaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:33: vairairebhiḥ kalahastyajati ya etad vairaṃ sa sukhaṃ śete //
SA09bsa015_u:34: Sl_17 jale 'vanau pāṣāṇe citramiva cittaṃ tridhā khalu sattvānām /
SA09bsa015_u:36: Sl_18 vācastridhā janebhyaḥ proktā jinena madhurasatyamithyākhyā /
SA09bsa015_u:38: Sl_19 caturvidhā vai puruṣāḥ prakāśātprakāśe tamasastamasi punaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:39: tamaḥ prakāśād gacchati tamasastejasi pudgalo varaḥ prathamaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:40: Sl_20 janānāṃ tvāmraphalamiva pakvamapakve pakve 'pakvatulyaṃ ca /
SA09bsa015_u:41: apakve 'pakvaṃ tathā pakve pakvamiva bhāti cāturvidhyam //
SA09bsa015_u:42: Sl_21 paradārānna tu paśyed dṛṣṭe ca jñeyā avasthānurūpyeṇa /
SA09bsa015_u:47: pāśaistasya hi baddho bhavacārake lokaḥ sa prahātavyaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:48: Sl_24 calādhruvāṇi ṣaḍakṣāṇi jayanti samare vā śatrūnapi caike /
SA09bsa015_u:49: tayośca sudhiyaḥ prathamaṃ varamindriyavijetāraṃ ca manyante //
SA09bsa015_u:52: Sl_26 kṛmipīḍito hi kuṣṭhī sukhalipsayā ca yathā vahnimāśrayate /
SA09bsa015_u:53: pīḍā na yāti śāntiṃ tathaiva hi kāmāsaktirapi boddhavyā //
SA09bsa015_u:54: Sl_27 paramārthaṃ prativettuṃ sarvabhāveṣu savidhi manasi nidhāyaiva /
SA09bsa015_u:55: sa ca khalu bhāvayitavyo na hi tattulyo 'paro guṇayuto dharmaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:56: Sl_28 sukulīno 'pi na pūjyo jñānaśīlavimukho śrutirūpavān pumān /
SA09bsa015_u:58: Sl_29 aṣṭasu lokadharmeṣu lokavit samatayā pravartayeccittam /
SA09bsa015_u:61: pāpaṃ nācaraṇiyaṃ yataḥ katamo 'pi na narakaphalasya bhāgī //
SA09bsa015_u:62: Sl_31 na ca kṛntati pāpakarma tatkṣaṇamastrapātavat kamapi pāpinam /
SA09bsa015_u:65: apatrapā hrī muninā mudhaivāparadhanāni hi sādhāraṇāni //
SA09bsa015_u:69: santoṣo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ dhanaṃ vinaiva sa dhanikaḥ sati santoṣe //
SA09bsa015_u:70: Sl_35 yathā samṛddhāḥ puruṣā duḥkhino bhavanti naiva tathālpecchukāḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:71: yāvatyaḥ santi phaṇā ārya, duḥkhakarāḥ, nāgasya tāvatyaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:72: Sl_36 patnī tyājyā trividhā prakṛtyā ripusambaddhā svaghātikeva /
SA09bsa015_u:74: Sl_37 bhaginīsamānukūlā mitravad hṛdayaṅgamā ca sevanīyā /
SA09bsa015_u:77: kāyasthityai nitarāṃ na ca saundaryagarvamānārthaṃ sevyam //
SA09bsa015_u:78: Sl_39 dinamakhilaṃ śubhakārye yāpayed rātrerādyantau yāmau ca /
SA09bsa015_u:79: dhīman, madhye yāme śayīta yato hi na bhaved viphalā nidrā //
SA09bsa015_u:82: Sl_41 kāmān prītivicārau sukhañca duḥkhañca vihāya caturbhireva /
SA09bsa015_u:87: pāpaṃ tathaiva cālpaṃ nāśayatyalpakuśalaṃ na pūrṇakuśalam //
SA09bsa015_u:88: Sl_44 auddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhe ca kāmecchā /
SA09bsa015_u:93: punaḥ punastu cintayā pratipakṣeṇaivaṃ prahīyate mānaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:94: Sl_47 svargaṃ mokṣaṃ cecchet samyagdṛṣṭistāvad bhāvanīyaiva /
SA09bsa015_u:98: Sl_49 uktaṃ rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavāṃśca nātmā rūpe naivātmā /
SA09bsa015_u:99: na cātmanyasti rūpaṃ śūnyamevaṃ skandhacatuṣkamapi jñeyam //
SA09bsa015_u:100: Sl_50 skandhā na hi jāyante yadṛcchayā na prakṛtīśvarakālebhyaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:101: nāhetoḥ svabhāvato jñeyā ajñānena tṛṣṇayā jātāḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:102: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:103: Sl_51 ātmani mithyādṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā ca /
SA09bsa015_u:105: Sl_52 ātmāpekṣo mokṣaḥ parasmānna labhyate kimapi sāhāyyam /
SA09bsa015_u:109: Sl_54 rājan, buddhenoktaḥ kāyagatā smṛtiścaikāyano mārgaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:111: Sl_55 bahubādhaṃ tu jīvanaṃ vāyūdbhūtajalabudbudavadanityaṃ ca /
SA09bsa015_u:114: rajaḥsadharmī cānte sadā viyogaśīlo naśvaro jñeyaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:116: dhūlimātraṃ hi mūrtāḥ kā kathā durbalavapuṣāṃ mānavānām //
SA09bsa015_u:119: Sl_59 mahārṇavayugacchidre hi kūrmagrīvārpaṇācca mānuṣaṃ janma /
SA09bsa015_u:121: Sl_60 kecid ratnālaṅkṛtakanakapātraṃ ca pūrayanti purīṣeṇa /
SA09bsa015_u:126: sevyaḥ sadā supuruṣaḥ śamaḥ prāpto yato jinamapekṣya bahubhiḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:128: mleccho jaḍaśca sattvo yo hyutpanno buddhavirahite //
SA09bsa015_u:129: Sl_64 dīrghāyuṣi devakule janilabdhaścāṣṭākṣaṇā ime doṣāḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:130: ebhī rahito bhūtvā kṣaṇaṃ labdhvā janmanivṛttau prayateta //
SA09bsa015_u:132: virajya tataḥ śṛṇu tāvad doṣānetasyāvagacchan naradeva //
SA09bsa015_u:133: Sl_66 mitratvena ca śatruḥ putratvena pitāmbā ca bhāryātvena /
SA09bsa015_u:135: Sl_67 catuḥsamudrajalādapi janairadhikaṃ jananyāḥ stanyaṃ pītam /
SA09bsa015_u:139: Sl_69 lokapūjyo 'pi śakraḥ patati ca punaḥ karmavaśāddhi saṃsāre /
SA09bsa015_u:140: tadvacca cakravartī rājāpi punarbhavati hi dāso loke //
SA09bsa015_u:141: Sl_70 svarge 'psarasāṃ saukhyaṃ kucataṭisparśajaṃ caiva ciramanubhūya /
SA09bsa015_u:145: Sl_72 devāṅganāsevite nandane ramye copavane ca vihṛtya /
SA09bsa015_u:148: snātvā punaśca narake kṣāroṣṇodakavaitaraṇyāṃ hi patanti //
SA09bsa015_u:149: Sl_74 deveṣu kāmasukhaṃ ca kāmavītarāgasukhaṃ brahmalokeṣu /
SA09bsa015_u:151: Sl_75 padamavāpya suryendvoḥ svakāyaprabhayā pradīpya hi saṃsāram /
SA09bsa015_u:152: tamasi ca ghane praviṣṭaḥ prasāritamapi ca svīyakaraṃ na paśyati //
SA09bsa015_u:156: rauravāvīcyādau hi saṃghāte cāpi narake sadā duḥkham //
SA09bsa015_u:157: Sl_78 niṣpīḍyante tilavat kecanānye cūrṇavat peṣyante ca /
SA09bsa015_u:159: Sl_79 āsye 'nyeṣāṃ tadvat pātyate jvalitaṃ tāvallauhadravam /
SA09bsa015_u:160: āropyante kecana sakaṇṭake taptāyase sadā śūle //
SA09bsa015_u:162: utthāya karau vivaśā luñcyante tīkṣṇanakhatuṇḍaiśca kākaiḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:164: vṛddhaṃ vraṇantvasahyaṃ bhakṣyamāṇaṃ rudanti cākulā bhūmyām //
SA09bsa015_u:165: Sl_82 dahyante 'gnikuṇḍeṣu tena tadānanāni ca bhavanti vivṛtāni /
SA09bsa015_u:167: Sl_83 śvāsāvarodhasamaye pāpaḥ kālaṃkṛte ca narakaṃ prayāti /
SA09bsa015_u:169: Sl_84 śrutvā dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā paṭhitvā cāpi citrāṅkanaṃ narakasya /
SA09bsa015_u:171: Sl_85 yathā samastasukhānāṃ tṛṣṇākṣaya eva sarvottamaṃ sukhamiti /
SA09bsa015_u:173: Sl_86 ihaikasmiṃśca divase, triśataśūlaghātād bhavati ca yad duḥkham /
SA09bsa015_u:174: nārakīyaduḥkhasya hi tatrāpnoti samatāṃ na laghukalāṃ cāpi //
SA09bsa015_u:177: Sl_88 aniṣṭaphalabījāni tu kāyavākcittānāṃ hi durācaraṇāni /
SA09bsa015_u:178: bhavataivaṃ yatanīyaṃ śaktyā yena tadaṇumātraṃ na śiṣyeta //
SA09bsa015_u:179: Sl_89 tiryagyoniṣu nānā duḥkhāni bhavanti ca badhabandhanādīni /
SA09bsa015_u:181: Sl_90 kecid vai hanyante muktorṇāsthimāṃsacarmārthaṃ jīvāḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:182: yojyante khalu vivaśā anye padamuṣṭikaśāṅkuśaiḥ paśavaśca //
SA09bsa015_u:183: Sl_91 pretayonau na kṣayaṃ yātīṣṭālābhajanitā duḥkhadhārā ca /
SA09bsa015_u:186: tacca pīḍitaṃ kṣudhayā kṣiptamaśuci vastu na pratikārakṣamam //
SA09bsa015_u:189: Sl_94 nimnakoṭikaiḥ kaiścit pūyaraktādyaśucīni na ca labhyante /
SA09bsa015_u:191: Sl_95 candro grīṣme taptaḥ śaitye śīto bhānuśca hyetebhyaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:192: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭi pātācca niṣphalāstaravo nadyaśca śuṣyante //
SA09bsa015_u:194: na ca mriyante kecit pañca vā daśa sahasravarṣāṇi sattvāḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:197: Sl_98 svarge cātisukhaṃ yat tato 'pyadhikaduḥkhaṃ tataścyuternūnam /
SA09bsa015_u:198: evaṃ vicintya tajjñaiḥ kṣaratsukhāya na tṛṣṇā kāryā svarge //
SA09bsa015_u:199: Sl_99 vaivarṇyaṃ dehasya svāsane na ratirmlāyate 'pi mālā ca /
SA09bsa015_u:201: Sl_100 lakṣaṇāni hi pañcaiva mṛtyorbhavanti svargasthadeveṣu /
SA09bsa015_u:206: na kurvanti dhīmanto janmāvaraṇācca te satyadarśanāni //
SA09bsa015_u:209: Sl_104 jvalite śirasi ca vasane tannivṛttyupāyamupekṣya tvaritameva /
SA09bsa015_u:215: Sl_107 prajñābhāve dhyānaṃ dhyānābhāve 'pi na jāyate sā prajñā /
SA09bsa015_u:218: loke na cintanīyā yato tairnāpnoti cittameva śāntim //
SA09bsa015_u:219: Sl_109 evaṃ proktaṃ munināvidyayā karma karmaṇā ca vijñānam /
SA09bsa015_u:220: tasmācca nāmarūpaṃ tataḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni tataḥ sparśā vai //
SA09bsa015_u:221: Sl_110 tata utpannā vittirvedanāśrayeṇa jāyate khalu tṛṣṇā /
SA09bsa015_u:222: tasyāścopādānaṃ tato bhavo 'pi bhavācca jāyate jātiḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:226: samyagimaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa ca paśyati tattvadarśinaṃ buddhameva //
SA09bsa015_u:229: Sl_114 jātiriyaṃ duḥkhameva tṛṣṇā ca tasya samudayo mahān jñeyaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:232: kroḍe śriyaśca yeṣāṃ gṛhasthāstaranti kleśanadīṃ jñānāt //
SA09bsa015_u:233: Sl_116 ye dṛṣṭāryasatyāśca nāvirbhavanti te 'ṅkuravat pṛthivītaḥ /
SA09bsa015_u:234: nāvataranti ca gaganāt te 'pi pṛthagjanāḥ kleśavaśā hi pūrvam //
SA09bsa015_u:235: Sl_117 cittaṃ hi dharmamūlaṃ bhagavatoktamatastadapi sādhu damayecca /
SA09bsa015_u:236: bho nirbhaya, kiṃ bahunā kathanena yato 'yameva hitopadeśaḥ //
SA09bsa015_u:238: caryāguṇān sevasva śikṣāmācara jīvanaṃ ca kuru sārtham //
SA09bsa015_u:239: Sl_119 sarveṣāṃ kuśalāni tu sarvārthamanumodya svacaryātrayīṃ ca /
SA09bsa015_u:243: Sl_121 caramaṃ bhavaṃ gṛhītvā vyādhijarārāgadveṣāṃśca prahāya /
SA09bsa015_u:245: Sl_122 prajñāśīlatyāgodbhūtavimalakhyātiṃ bhuvi khe svarge ca /
SA09bsa015_u:246: loke prasārya śamayan narān yuvatisukharatadevāṃśca bhūmau //
